column2: Sport;Cambodia will go up against Hong Kong
column5: and  Iran in Group C of the World Cup 2022 qualifiers. They will play each team twice – once home and once away.------They need to secure a top two place in the group to progress to the FIFA World Cup qualifiers and a possible place in the Asian 2023 Cup. Third place or below would mean elimination.------Cambodia fixtures in the 2022 FIFA World Cup Qualifiers------1. September 5
